title: Homejacking
overview: An architect's house in the middle of the forest.One morning, a bourgeois couple is the victim of an intrusion. Isabelle and Richard Deloye are kidnapped by an anonymous attacker. Hidden under a pink hood, he carries a weapon and a can of gasoline, but we don't know what he's looking for. Fly ? Rape? Kill ? Or anything else that the couple still doesn't know... What if, deep down, the aggressor and the victims were not at all who we think?In search of a secret truth, the story is told from different points of view, over several eras. From episode to episode, the action converges towards the same setting. In this strange house lost in the middle of the forest, the threads of an incredible story of love and murder will come together...Â
